genresAdvancedInfo.name: kosovan folk
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Kosovan folk music is a genre of traditional music that originated in Kosovo. It is characterized by its use of traditional instruments such as the çifteli, lahuta, and gajde, and its themes of love, nature, and social issues. This genre has a rich history and has been passed down through generations, with many contemporary artists adding their own modern twists to the traditional sound.
